LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Disapproved.description: To cut down a tree is a distasteful thing to do.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Horrible.description: To cut down a tree is a horrible act.
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.label: 금지됨
LanguageData.TreeCutting_Prohibited.description: To violate the forest by cutting down a tree is a deeply abhorrent act and should never be done.
